name: accuwrite-homepage-redesign
description: Website redesign project for AccuWrite homepage

scripts.minify: npx html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true index.html -o dist/index.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx surge dist/ --domain accuwrite-redesign.surge.sh

author: AccuWrite Team
